div.p: I love coming to RMA because I can work the rest of the day. I can do the classes at my pace and I will graduate earlier.
You want to come to school today. They make you want to come. It is worth it. I want to be veterinary technician. I love animals.
I heard about RMA from my friends. The four hours is way better than going for eight hours. I work from 5-9, at work, so RMA helps me be able to work.

h4.a: Remote instruction to continue through the end of the 2019-2020 school year
